posts.title: GSoC 2025 Zarr: Introduction
posts.text: Introduction to the Bit-Packing Project of Zarr under NumFOCUS Side Channel Analysis (SCA) has grown into a critical area of research due to its profound implications for both security and privacy. By examining power consumption from electronic devices, attackers can infer sensitive information. SCA contributes to developing stronger cryptographic protocols, more secure hardware designs, and advanced countermeasures. In addition, better protection against side channel attacks safeguards personal data and financial transactions, underscoring the vital need for ongoing investigation in this field. A key challenge in large-scale SCA arises from the massive volume of high-resolution measurements needed for thorough security evaluations. These measurements often captured at 10-bit or 12-bit resolution, with large datasets for each time steps. The SCARR framework (Bosland et al. 2024) introduce a high-performance design patterns, combined with a modern file format Zarr and optimized compression, which can substantially reduce data sizes while accelerating key SCA algorithms. This enable SCA procedures such as Signal-to-Noise Ratio (SNR) and Correlation Power Analysis (CPA) to run significantly faster, often outperforming existing frameworks by a factor of two. Zarr’s design, which allows for on-the-fly compression and efficient random access to large datasets, is ideally suited for SCA research. Integrating specialized bit-packing algorithms into Zarr can further boost performance when handling 10-bit or 12-bit ADC samples, providing both lower storage costs and faster I/O operations. In doing so, the project directly contributes to SCARR’s vision of making side-channel evaluations more scalable and cost-effective, ultimately enabling more comprehensive security testing in SCA research. This Google Summer of Code project aims to create bit-packing compression method optimized for SCA data in the open source library Zarr. By focusing on an approach that caters to 10-bit or 12-bit ADC samples, the project seeks to find any possible compression method that performs between the baseline of uncompressed data, and LZ4 within HDF5. Through efficient compression, the initiative will help researchers spend more time on analysis and less time on I/O, thereby enabling faster experimentation and a deeper exploration of side channel analysis Reference Bosland, Jonah et al. (Mar. 2024). “High-Performance Design Patterns and File Formats for Side-Channel Analysis”. pages.title: About me
pages.text: 分享很喜欢的老罗的一段话： “每一个生命来到世间都注定改变世界，别无选择。要么变得好一点，要么变得坏一点。你如果走进社会为了生存为了什么不要脸的理由，变成了一个恶心的成年人社会中的一员，那你就把这个世界变得恶心了一点点。如果你一生刚正不阿，如果你一生耿直，没有做任何恶心的事情，没做对别人有害的事情，一辈子拼了老命勉强把自己身边的几个人照顾好了，没有成名没有发财，没有成就伟大的事业，然后耿着脖子一生正直，到了七八十岁耿着脖子去世了。你这一生是不是没有改变世界？你还是改变世界了，你把这个世界变得美好了一点点。因为世界上又多了一个好人。“ 善恶终有报,天道好轮回。不信抬头看,苍天饶过谁。无论何时何地，我们都要保持一颗积极乐观、善良感恩的心。但行好事莫问前程，永远年轻，永远热内盈眶，永远保持正能量。💪💪💪💪💪💪冲鸭！！！！ ->>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>个人信息：计算机科学与技术专业从事JAVA后端开发码畜一枚坚信代码改变世界 博客信息 网站采用的Icarus主题 追求尽可能的简洁，清晰，易用。 在Icarus主题之上进行了部分修改。 更新日志：–2020.09.20：icarus4.0适配–2020.01.18：icarus3.0适配–2019.11.17：增加深色主题开关–2019.10.30：去图，精简卡片–2019.10.22：改版部分显示，优化速度–2019.10.16：文章列表加上评论数显示–2019.10.13：改版评论–2019.09.25：图片、资源接入CDN免费jsDelivr、文章加入置顶–2019.09.19：开源博客代码–2019.09.19：修改布局，拉伸布局，更宽的展示–2019.09.18：修改友链ui为一行三个，并适配移动端，暗黑模式文章增加评论链接，增加留言链接–2019.09.14：增加精简next主题–2019.09.14：利用中秋节放假，重做了首页的热门推荐、加个widget最新评论框、归档页加入文章贡献概览面板 本站推荐索引 博客主题相关 github Issue 作为博客微型数据库的应用 github page网站cdn优化加速 博客源码分享 博客换肤的一种实现方式思路 博客中gitalk最新评论的获取 博客图片上传picgo工具github图传使用 安装、部分配置icarus主题中文版 技术知识点 Java并发知识点 法律法规 法律法规数据库 中华人民共和国国旗法 中华人民共和国宪法 中华人民共和国消费者权益保护法 中华人民共和国刑事诉讼法 中华人民共和国婚姻法 中华人名共和国网络安全法 中华人民共和国劳动法 其他 网易云音乐歌单分享 计划2020计划 2019.12.31 2020-GOALS 跑两三场马拉松 2019计划 2018.12.31/21:59:00->更新于2019.12.31 2019-GOALS 购买的专业书籍至少看完一遍（并发、重构、设计模式…）-> 95%额外： 追了很多剧总结： 有优点有缺点，没坚持下来的还是太多，追了太多剧。以后多学习，多思考！ 时间轴记录
